attributes.action: Give me my Bus pass I paid my way I worked all my life im entitled to it..
attributes.additional_details: Why do uk residents not get a by as pass this id not a just or fair society, giving it in some areas and not others
attributes.background: It's available in Scotland Wales And London im a UK citizen im being targeted for living where I do I am no richer than those getting it, I'm 60 and I still work like many others iv well over paid my dues to Society.
